entry.title: WIND WARNING, Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:00 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
